name: check-aov
title: Arena of Valor (AOV)
description: Memeriksa dan mengambil nama/nickname pemain Arena of Valor (AOV) berdasarkan Open ID.
curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-aov \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"user_id":"MASUKKAN_OPEN_ID"}'
